---
id: fetch-forbid-group-list
title: "Query the list of muted groups in the App"
description: "This API is used to query the IDs of all muted groups in the App, including groups in all-member mute, group role mute, or user ID mute status."
api: 
info_path: core_products/zim/en/docs_zim_server/Group/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Query the list of muted groups in the App</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


This API is used to query the IDs of all muted groups in the App, including groups in all-member mute, group role mute, or user ID mute status.

This API returns 10,000 groups by default each time. If you need to adjust this limit, please contact ZEGOCLOUD Technical Support.

<Note title="QPS Limit"> 20 times/s</Note>

## Request

For the complete return codes, please refer to [Return codes](/zim-server/return-codes).\n<table>\n<thead><tr><th>Return code</th><th>Description</th><th>Suggested Solution</th></tr></thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr><td>660000002</td><td>Input parameter error.</td><td>Please check the input parameters.</td></tr>\n<tr><td>660000003</td><td>Logic processing error.</td><td>Please retry or contact ZEGOCLOUD Technical Support.</td></tr>\n<tr><td>660000011</td><td>Number of users exceeds the limit.</td><td>Please check the input user list.</td></tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n","example":0}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Message"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Description of the operation result.","example":"success"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"RequestId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Request ID.","example":"343649807833778782"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"FetchEnd"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":{"Whether the retrieval is complete":[{"0":"No."},{"1":"Yes."}]},"example":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"NextFlag"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"- When FetchEnd is 0, it means there are still more groups to retrieve. You can use this as the StartFlag for the next API call.\n- When FetchEnd is 1, it means the list has been fully retrieved. Please ignore this field at this time.\n","example":100000}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>GroupList</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span></span></summary><div className={"schema-description-container"}><div className={"schema-description"}>List of muted groups.</div><li className={"opening-array-bracket-container"}><div className={"opening-array-bracket"}><span className={"opening-array-bracket_text"}>Array</span><span className={"opening-array-bracket_symbol"}>[</span></div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"GroupId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Group ID.","example":"group_1"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"ForbidType"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Mute type:\n- 1: All-member mute\n- 2: Group role mute\n- 4: User ID mute\n\nIf multiple mute situations exist simultaneously, ForbidType will add these values together. For example, when both all-member mute (1) and group role mute (2) exist, ForbidType is 3.\n","example":1}}></SchemaItem><li className={"closing-array-bracket-container"}><div className={"closing-array-bracket"}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"Code\": 0,\n  \"Message\": \"success\",\n  \"RequestId\": \"343649807833778782\",\n  \"FetchEnd\": 1,\n  \"NextFlag\": 100000,\n  \"GroupList\": [\n    {\n      \"GroupId\": \"group_1\",\n      \"ForbidType\": 1\n    }\n  ]\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example"} value={"Example"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"Code\": 0,\n  \"Message\": \"success\",\n  \"RequestId\": \"343649807833778782\",\n  \"FetchEnd\": 1,\n  \"NextFlag\": 100000,\n  \"GroupList\": [\n    {\n      \"GroupId\": \"group_1\",\n      \"ForbidType\": 1\n    },\n    {\n      \"GroupId\": \"group_2\",\n      \"ForbidType\": 5\n    }\n  ]\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
